name: VisitTri-ValleyGuide
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: visit tri valley guide
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Visit Tri-Valley is just outside of San Francisco, California and features the cities of Pleasanton, Livermore, Dublin, and the town of Danville.
The Tri-Valley is home to nearly 60 wineries, a craft beer trail with 23 stops, the first ice cream trail, a caffeine trail, unspoiled hiking and biking trails, lakes, delightfully-diverse restaurants, California’s largest premium outlet shopping center, a world-class mall, one-of-a-kind boutique shops, sunshine and fresh air. You’ll find friendly people, fewer crowds and clean city charm. Explore the “trails.” You’ll also find the Tri-Valley is extremely dog-friendly. So bring your furry family member. Spend a few days there on your way to Yosemite or make it your final destination. Visit Tri-Valley has maps for wineries, breweries, ice cream, coffee and tea trails, and shopping to guide you along your Tri-Venture.
